verbose_text: A concentration of 0.01-1.4 mug IBP mL -1 has been shown to inhibit ice recrystallization by microbial IBPs from Antarctic cyanobacterial mats, moss, and algae, suggesting that 3519-10 's IBP has a comparable RI activity.
